attributes.action: STRICTER PENALTIES FOR RACIST FOOTBALL FANS
attributes.additional_details:
The Football Offences Act 1991 says that any offenders on the pitch(crowds) will be fined,not arrested.This Act implies on only ‘designated matches such as matches in the Premier league and the Scottish Prem.The maximum fine is only up to £1000.
A while ago,I played in a local football match,a friendly.Im from a different minority myself,not born in England.The crowd which consisted of 500-1500  people,30% started calling me different names like ‘refugee’ or ‘you don't belong here.

Sign this petition if you want to lobby the FA to make penalties for footballing racism for severe and heavier.Make your concern heard!
attributes.background: We want to lobby the FA so that they can improve their punishment system for Racist Fans.We want the FA to put on heavier fines for offenders,upwards of £5,000 or more,depending on the severity of the offence.

rejection.details:
Disciplinary measures by the Football Association are a matter for them, not the UK Government or Parliament. The Government therefore cannot implement the action your petition calls for.

You might like to sign the following petitions which call for related actions:

'Introduce a higher maximum prison sentence for Racial Abuse': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591649

'Increase the sentence for Racist Hate Crime from 6 months to minimum 5 years': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591766

'Lifetime bans on attending football matches for racist or violent offences': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591894

'Require lifetime Football Banning Orders for racist football offences': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591817
